Class SnapscreenClipSharingConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snapscreen.sdk.ui.SnapscreenClipSharingConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SnapscreenClipSharingConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Configuration object to be passed when sharing a clip
